data.actual_result: The search filters become completely disabled. Even manually typing them does not work.
data.expected_result: Search behaves like normal mentions do in streamer mode, and shows a list of usernames and avatars, just without the discrims.
data.short_description: Streamer Mode completely disables the from: and mentions: filters in search, as opposed to just hiding the User Discrims
data.steps_to_repro: - Start streamer mode - Attempt to search using a from: filter or a mentions: filter
